verses.verse: In the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of Darius <WH1867> the son <WH1121> of Ahasuerus, <WH325> of the seed <WH4480> <WH2233> of the Medes, <WH4074> which <WH834> was made king <WH4427> over <WH5921> the realm <WH4438> of the Chaldeans; <WH3778>

In the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of his reign <WH4427> I <WH589> Daniel <WH1840> understood <WH995> by books <WH5612> the number <WH4557> of the years, <WH8141> whereof <WH834> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to <WH413> Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet, <WH5030> that he would accomplish <WH4390> seventy <WH7657> years <WH8141> in the desolations <WH2723> of Jerusalem. <WH3389>

And I set <WH5414> <WH853> my face <WH6440> unto <WH413> the Lord <WH136> God, <WH430> to seek <WH1245> by prayer <WH8605> and supplications, <WH8469> with fasting, <WH6685> and sackcloth, <WH8242> and ashes: <WH665>

And I prayed <WH6419> unto the LORD <WH3068> my God, <WH430> and made my confession, <WH3034> and said, <WH559> O <WH577> Lord, <WH136> the great <WH1419> and dreadful <WH3372> God, <WH410> keeping <WH8104> the covenant <WH1285> and mercy <WH2617> to them that love <WH157> him, and to them that keep <WH8104> his commandments; <WH4687>

We have sinned, <WH2398> and have committed iniquity, <WH5753> and have done wickedly, <WH7561> and have rebelled, <WH4775> even by departing <WH5493> from thy precepts <WH4480> <WH4687> and from thy judgments: <WH4480> <WH4941>

Neither <WH3808> have we hearkened <WH8085> unto <WH413> thy servants <WH5650> the prophets, <WH5030> which <WH834> spoke <WH1696> in thy name <WH8034> to <WH413> our kings, <WH4428> our princes, <WH8269> and our fathers, <WH1> and to <WH413> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land. <WH776>

O Lord, <WH136> righteousness <WH6666> belongeth unto thee, but unto us confusion <WH1322> of faces, <WH6440> as at this <WH2088> day; <WH3117> to the men <WH376> of Judah, <WH3063> and to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and unto all <WH3605> Israel, <WH3478> that are near, <WH7138> and that are far off, <WH7350> through all <WH3605> the countries <WH776> whither <WH834> <WH8033> thou hast driven <WH5080> them, because of their trespass <WH4604> that <WH834> they have trespassed <WH4603> against thee.
O Lord, <WH3068> to us belongeth confusion <WH1322> of face, <WH6440> to our kings, <WH4428> to our princes, <WH8269> and to our fathers, <WH1> because <WH834> we have sinned <WH2398> against thee.
To the Lord <WH136> our God <WH430> belong mercies <WH7356> and forgivenesses, <WH5547> though <WH3588> we have rebelled <WH4775> against him;

Neither <WH3808> have we obeyed <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> to walk <WH1980> in his laws, <WH8451> which <WH834> he set <WH5414> before <WH6440> us by <WH3027> his servants <WH5650> the prophets. <WH5030>

Yea, all <WH3605> Israel <WH3478> have transgressed <WH5674> <WH853> thy law, <WH8451> even by departing, <WH5493> that they might not <WH1115> obey <WH8085> thy voice; <WH6963> therefore the curse <WH423> is poured <WH5413> upon <WH5921> us, and the oath <WH7621> that <WH834> is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Moses <WH4872> the servant <WH5650> of God, <WH430> because <WH3588> we have sinned <WH2398> against him.

And he hath confirmed <WH6965> <WH853> his words, <WH1697> which <WH834> he spoke <WH1696> against <WH5921> us, and against <WH5921> our judges <WH8199> that <WH834> judged <WH8199> us, by bringing <WH935> upon <WH5921> us a great <WH1419> evil: <WH7451> for <WH834> under <WH8478> the whole <WH3605> heaven <WH8064> hath not <WH3808> been done <WH6213> as <WH834> hath been done <WH6213> upon Jerusalem. <WH3389>

As <WH834> it is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of Moses, <WH4872> <WH853> all <WH3605> this <WH2063> evil <WH7451> is come <WH935> upon <WH5921> us: yet made we not our prayer <WH2470> <WH3808> <WH853> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> our God, <WH430> that we might turn <WH7725> from our iniquities, <WH4480> <WH5771> and understand <WH7919> thy truth. <WH571>

Therefore hath the LORD <WH3068> watched <WH8245> upon <WH5921> the evil, <WH7451> and brought <WH935> it upon <WH5921> us: for <WH3588> the LORD <WH3068> our God <WH430> is righteous <WH6662> in <WH5921> all <WH3605> his works <WH4639> which <WH834> he doeth: <WH6213> for we obeyed <WH8085> not <WH3808> his voice. <WH6963>

And now, <WH6258> O Lord <WH136> our God, <WH430> that <WH834> hast brought thy people forth <WH3318> <WH853> <WH5971> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and hast gotten <WH6213> thee renown, <WH8034> as at this <WH2088> day; <WH3117> we have sinned, <WH2398> we have done wickedly. <WH7561>

O Lord, <WH136> according to all <WH3605> thy righteousness, <WH6666> I beseech thee, <WH4994> let thine anger <WH639> and thy fury <WH2534> be turned away <WH7725> from thy city <WH4480> <WH5892> Jerusalem, <WH3389> thy holy <WH6944> mountain: <WH2022> because <WH3588> for our sins, <WH2399> and for the iniquities <WH5771> of our fathers, <WH1> Jerusalem <WH3389> and thy people <WH5971> are become a reproach <WH2781> to all <WH3605> that are about <WH5439> us.

Now <WH6258> therefore, O our God, <WH430> hear <WH8085> <WH413> the prayer <WH8605> of thy servant, <WH5650> and his supplications, <WH8469> and cause thy face <WH6440> to shine <WH215> upon <WH5921> thy sanctuary <WH4720> that is desolate, <WH8076> for the Lord's sake. <WH4616> <WH136>

O my God, <WH430> incline <WH5186> thine ear, <WH241> and hear; <WH8085> open <WH6491> thine eyes, <WH5869> and behold <WH7200> our desolations, <WH8074> and the city <WH5892> which <WH834> is called <WH7121> by <WH5921> thy name: <WH8034> for <WH3588> we <WH587> do not <WH3808> present <WH5307> our supplications <WH8469> before <WH6440> thee for <WH5921> our righteousnesses, <WH6666> but <WH3588> for <WH5921> thy great <WH7227> mercies. <WH7356>

O Lord, <WH136> hear; <WH8085> O Lord, <WH136> forgive; <WH5545> O Lord, <WH136> hearken <WH7181> and do; <WH6213> defer <WH309> not, <WH408> for thine own sake, <WH4616> O my God: <WH430> for <WH3588> thy city <WH5892> and thy people <WH5971> are called <WH7121> by thy name. <WH8034>

And while <WH5750> I <WH589> was speaking, <WH1696> and praying, <WH6419> and confessing <WH3034> my sin <WH2403> and the sin <WH2403> of my people <WH5971> Israel, <WH3478> and presenting <WH5307> my supplication <WH8467> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> my God <WH430> for <WH5921> the holy <WH6944> mountain <WH2022> of my God; <WH430>

Yea, while <WH5750> I <WH589> was speaking <WH1696> in prayer, <WH8605> even the man <WH376> Gabriel, <WH1403> whom <WH834> I had seen <WH7200> in the vision <WH2377> at the beginning, <WH8462> being caused to fly <WH3286> swiftly, <WH3288> touched <WH5060> <WH413> me about the time <WH6256> of the evening <WH6153> oblation. <WH4503>
And he informed <WH995> me, and talked <WH1696> with <WH5973> me, and said, <WH559> O Daniel, <WH1840> I am now <WH6258> come forth <WH3318> to give thee skill <WH7919> and understanding. <WH998>

At the beginning <WH8462> of thy supplications <WH8469> the commandment <WH1697> came forth, <WH3318> and I <WH589> am come <WH935> to show <WH5046> thee; for <WH3588> thou <WH859> art greatly beloved: <WH2530> therefore understand <WH995> the matter, <WH1697> and consider <WH995> the vision. <WH4758>

Seventy <WH7657> weeks <WH7620> are determined <WH2852> upon <WH5921> thy people <WH5971> and upon <WH5921> thy holy <WH6944> city, <WH5892> to finish <WH3607> the transgression, <WH6588> and to make an end <WH2856> of sins, <WH2403> and to make reconciliation <WH3722> for iniquity, <WH5771> and to bring in <WH935> everlasting <WH5769> righteousness, <WH6664> and to seal up <WH2856> the vision <WH2377> and prophecy, <WH5030> and to anoint <WH4886> the most Holy. <WH6944> <WH6944>

Know <WH3045> therefore and understand, <WH7919> that from <WH4480> the going forth <WH4161> of the commandment <WH1697> to restore <WH7725> and to build <WH1129> Jerusalem <WH3389> unto <WH5704> the Messiah <WH4899> the Prince <WH5057> shall be seven <WH7651> weeks, <WH7620> and threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks: <WH7620> the street <WH7339> shall be built <WH1129> again, <WH7725> and the wall, <WH2742> even in troublous <WH6695> times. <WH6256>

And after <WH310> threescore <WH8346> and two <WH8147> weeks <WH7620> shall Messiah <WH4899> be cut off, <WH3772> but not <WH369> for himself: and the people <WH5971> of the prince <WH5057> that shall come <WH935> shall destroy <WH7843> the city <WH5892> and the sanctuary; <WH6944> and the end <WH7093> thereof shall be with a flood, <WH7858> and unto <WH5704> the end <WH7093> of the war <WH4421> desolations <WH8074> are determined. <WH2782>

And he shall confirm <WH1396> the covenant <WH1285> with many <WH7227> for one <WH259> week: <WH7620> and in the midst <WH2677> of the week <WH7620> he shall cause the sacrifice <WH2077> and the oblation <WH4503> to cease, <WH7673> and for <WH5921> the overspreading <WH3671> of abominations <WH8251> he shall make it desolate, <WH8074> even until <WH5704> the consummation, <WH3617> and that determined <WH2782> shall be poured <WH5413> upon <WH5921> the desolate. <WH8076>
